long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser add-on designed to boost your sales, save you time, and elevate the visibility of your designs on Redbubble.

âœ…Advanced Tag Usage Data: ee how often each tag is used across designs to make informed decisions.

âœ…Quick Tag Checks: Click on any tag to instantly open a new Redbubble search page for that tag.

âœ…Select & Copy Tags Easily: Choose specific tags and copy them with one click, tailored to your needs.

âœ…Maximum Price: Check the price of most expensive item on page.

âœ…Average Price: View the average price of items for better market analysis.

âœ…Main Badges: Highlight tags frequently used as the primary tag in designs.

âœ…First Badge: Spot tags appearing in the first five designs of your search results.

âœ…Title Badges: Spot tags frequently appearing in design titles, signaling their importance.

âœ…Topics Badges: Discover tags marked as key topics.

âœ…Related Badges: Uncover tags listed at the end of the search results page.

âœ…Google Trends: Analyze up to five tags at a time with one click, revealing seasonal and trending opportunities through Google Trends.

âœ…Author Insights: View a detailed list of authors, including the number of designs each has created.

* This application retrieves data directly from the current webpage you are viewing. Any changes made by the webpage owner - such as updates to their layout, content structure, or data accessibility - may impact the application's functionality. If this happens, rest assured that we will work to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
